name: Lin
description: Responsibility that comes with identity, a burden and a trial.

set.set_2: Increase ATK by **2%**/**3%**/**3%**/**4%** on hit for **18** seconds, stacking up to **5** times. Only the highest level is effective when effects are duplicated.
set.set_4: Every **5**m traveled within Moonlight Realm grants **1** stack of Moonlight, increasing final damage by **4%**/**5%**/**6%**/**7%** for **15** seconds, stacking up to **3** times. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
